channel.title: Does Hamachi have a virus or keylogger or both?
channel.description: Read above because i want to set my Private server on hamachi and if it has a virus or keylogger i dont want to download if i do i can mess up my new laptop so anyone can help i would be so happy

item.title: Does Hamachi have a virus or keylogger or both?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

ice123:

Moparisthebest, can i just set up a network in IRC or no would it be better?

I don’t really understand the question. Could you set up an IRC server using hamachi? I guess, but there is no purpose.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Hamachi have a virus or keylogger or both?

item.title: Does Hamachi have a virus or keylogger or both?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:4, topic:143041”][quote author=ice123 link=topic=195763.msg1754867#msg1754867 date=1189739532]
Moparisthebest, can i just set up a network in IRC or no would it be better?
[/quote]

… is thta even fucking possible? irc doesn’t have anything to do wiht private servers ice[/quote]

Neither does Hamachi. Hamachi is a networking program to establish a direct link to another computer so users with NAT enabled firewalls don’t need forward their ports, I suggest you read this, this, and finally, this.

ice123:

Moparisthebest, can i just set up a network in IRC or no would it be better?

You probably could, but don’t neglect those “security in programming” guides.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Hamachi have a virus or keylogger or both?

item.title: Does Hamachi have a virus or keylogger or both?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I believe the hamachi program itself is safe, but if you aren’t very careful setting it up others that join your network can put viruses or keyloggers on your computer.

Just set up your server like normal, there is no reason to use hamachi at all.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Hamachi have a virus or keylogger or both?
